full_summary:
===============

### Truck Canopy Tender

#### Reference Information
---------------------------

* Reference number: [CB-813-74114764][1]
* Solicitation number: M2989-3-0091
* Amendment number: 4
* Publication date: 2023-10-25

#### Tender Information
----------------------

* Tender closing date: 2023-11-24T17:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-01-01
* Expected contract end date: 2026-12-31
* Tender status: Expired

#### Procurement Details
-----------------------

* Procurement category: Goods and Services
* Trade agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code:
	+ 25174800: Specialized vehicle systems and components
	+ 25180000: Vehicle bodies and trailers
* Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): Not applicable
* Request for Standing Offer type: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Contract Information
------------------------

* Contracting entity: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Contact information:
	+ Stephanie Kington
	+ Email: [stephanie.kington@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.kington@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (778) 290-2816

#### Tender Description
---------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) E Division Post Garage has a requirement for the provision and installation of Commercial-Off-The-Shelf (COTS) truck canopies and slide-in transferable service bodies for commercial pattern pick-up trucks. The deliverables must be received on or before the date mentioned on associated call-ups.

This procurement is conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses certified under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) criteria.

### Download Official Documentation
--------------------------------

To access the complete tender invitation, please visit [the link to the official website where the tender documents can be downloaded][2].

Note:
[1]: Please refer to the official reference number for complete tender information.
[2]: Please note that the link to the official website may require a login or registration to access the tender documents. Be sure to carefully review the tender requirements and ensure that your company is eligible to participate.
